item.title: The Unknown Fear
item.description:
About This Game

A horror game focused on a mystery story. In addition to an experimental system where game events are controlled by an AI, making these events dynamic, making each game unique.

The game is part of a series of original games called THE UNKNOWN FEAR which will be 5 horror and mystery games. Each game will tell a part of this story and only with the 5 will everything make sense.

In this first game you will play the role of a person who doesn't even remember his own name, but who will be forced to complete a task given by a mysterious scientist who is indifferent to his safety and promises in exchange his freedom and a new life.

item.title: Bondman Of Traps
item.description:
About This Game

Explorer Daniel finally obtains the map of the hidden treasure after a long quest. He parachutes onto the location of the treasure, a place not visible on the world map. Our hero must navigate through a challenging and perilous journey, overcoming deadly traps, to ultimately reach the great treasure.

Will you be able to reach the treasure despite all the obstacles and traps, or will you become a Bondman of Traps?

Conquer the Challenging Platforms One by One


Passing through platform elements is truly challenging. In some platform sections, you must make quick decisions and take action. So, plan, prepare, and take action. There's no need to rush. Or is there?



The game features different mechanics filled with surprises in some platform elements. You can't rely only on traps; platforms may also deceive you and contain traps for you to make mistakes.

Identify and Solve the Traps


Most traps will take your life and try to kill you. Recognize the obstacles, analyze the movements, and improve your reflexes.

Trust Yourself and Your Reflexes


In Bondman Of Traps, dozens of traps and numerous platform elements will do their best to make you fail in this journey. So, what will you do? Accept this challenge. Solve the secrets of the traps. Improve your reflexes and show them who you are.

item.title: CROSS DUNGEON
item.description:
About This Game

Connect the tiles and conquer the dungeon.
Monsters and treasure await!
Defeat monsters and move on.
Power up when you get the treasure.
Let's proceed while collecting treasures.

‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï

‚ñ†Keyboard control

„ÉªMenu, title

Movement: wasd, arrow keys, mouse drag
Submit: j, Enter, left mouse click
Cancel: Escape, Backspace, k


„ÉªIn Game

Movement: wasd, arrow keys, mouse drag
Put tile: j, Enter, left mouse click
Rotation: k, Space
Skip: l, rightShift
Menu: i, rightCtrl
Skill: o, leftCtrl
Camera movement: right mouse drag
Camera movement mode switching: u, rightAlt
Zoom: pageUp pageDown, mouse wheel

item.title: The Last Veggies
item.description:
About This Game

The Story

A giant meteor full of weird looking creatures has crashed on our planet. Those monsters overran our cities and ate all our food before we were even ready to defend ourselves. The survivors have set up giant safezones that are monster free but they are running out of food. Carl and his friends, a special team of veggie loving monster killers have been sent to the farmlands, the last green spot on earth to look for a new food source. Grow veggies, deliver them to the safezones and fight of those evil creatures as long as you can!

The Game

In the Last Veggies it is all about Veggies and Monsters. Plant veggies, deliver them to make some money or defend them at all costs. Use your income to buy random items and upgrades for yourself, your weapons or your farm! Fight waves of monsters and defeat even more powerful bosses! Collect golden carrots by defeating enemies to unlock new playable characters, maps or even gamemodes!


Veggie Delivery

An Endless gamemode with Veggies, Monsters, Raiders, evil Bosses and even Lootatos for the right amount of fun! Here you have to plant, defend and deliver your veggies to make a living and to secure the survival of humanity. Delivering veggies will provide you with some cash to buy upgrades for yourself or your farm! watch out for Raiders that attack your farm and prepare yourself for insanely powerful bosses! Survive as long as you can!


The Last Veggies

You are slowly running out of seeds to plant veggies and there are not that many left... Defend the Last Veggies until help arrives! In this gamemode you will have to defend veggies to the last Wave. You will gain some money for each surviving veggies that you can use for upgrades and items to make surviving a little easier. There are no Bosses or Raiders here but that doesn't mean that this gamemode is easier!


Seed Savers

Oh no! Now we are running out of Seeds! Travel to secret location where humanity has stored the last of the seeds to make sure that there are always enough veggies. get those seeds to your vehicle and leave before you are overrun! This mode includes evil bosses, new creatures and tons of seeds!

A wide Selection of Characters

Carl has a lot of friends out in the Farmlands and you can play each one of them. Every Character comes with a unique set of skills and each character carries a different weapon that will change your playstyle completely!

Choose your difficulty

Each Map and GameMode can be played in 3 different difficulty levels. If those 3 difficulties are still not enough for you there are events that can be switched on or off to make the game even harder! But the higher the difficulty the higher the chance to fond rare golden carrots!

item.title: Laser 77 - Virtual Lab
item.description:
About This Game

'Laser 77 - Virtual Lab' is a single-player, 2D, sci-fi action game inspired by the classic games of the early 80's. It uses virtual reality as a theme, posing as a futuristic sofware from 1977.

In the game, you take the role of 'Laser', a mysterious blue being from outer space.
Armed with his trusty liquid sword and a powerfull light beam gun, he trains in the virtual labyrinth course of his ship to hone important abilities for future adventures.
When the simulation goes haywire, will Laser have the strength to overcome improbable odds while still beating the high score?

> Confront the robots and holograms of the simulation in this retro inspired 2D action game.
> Hone your reflexes and train your awareness while battling different enemies and bosses using a variety of skills.
> Explore different areas packed with new critters and rescue friendly hostage robots that can watch your back.
> Access lore stations containing information about the beings and mechanisms inhabiting this original sci-fi universe.
> Find secret life stashes and itens to help you survive the hologram onslaught.

This game program includes:
- 20+ stages
- New abilities
- Boss battles
- High intensity action

Do you have what it takes to clear the labyrinth?

item.title: TWISTEX
item.description:
About This Game

PLAY ON SCREEN OR IN VR

Let's get twisting!!!

TWISTEX is a falling block puzzle game with a 'twist'. It combines classic gameplay with original new mechanics.

CLEAR RINGS, COLORS AND LEVELS
Clear 48 levels across 2 distinct game types, or see how long you can last in endless mode with 3 difficulties.

FEEL THE PRESSURE
As the blocks get higher, so does the pressure. Try to keep your cool as the music and environment react to how you're doing.

UNLOCK AND CUSTOMIZE
Clearing levels will unlock new towers, blocks, music and environments, for you to customize your experience.

LEADERBOARDS
Compete for the top spot, or beat your friends, in the online leaderboards.

VR OR NO
Play the non-VR version with a controller, keyboard or mouse, with plenty of options to suit your playstyle.
The VR version is a whole different experience, with motion controls made especially for VR.


Join the Discord server to get involved or follow the socials for the latest updates.

item.title: Medieval Machines Builder - First Siege
item.description:
About This Game



Prepare to take your first steps into a world of medieval intrigue, craftsmanship, and warfare. Will you withstand the First Siege and lay the groundwork for a legacy that echoes through the ages? The journey begins with Medieval Machines Builder - First Siege.

Key Features

üõ†Ô∏è Tools:
Master the art of siege construction with a diverse array of tools at your disposal. Precision is key as you forge the instruments of war that will shape the battlefield.

üåæ Gathering:
Venture into the medieval wilderness to gather essential resources for your siege endeavors.



üéØ Testing:
Put your creations to the test on the proving grounds.

üí• Demolishing:
In war, destruction is as crucial as construction. Learn the delicate balance of tearing down enemy fortifications with powerful siege engines, unleashing chaos upon your foes.

üè∞ Building Siege Machines:
Be the architect of devastation. Construct an arsenal of siege machines, from trebuchets to battering rams, each meticulously designed to breach enemy defenses and secure your dominance.



üîó Connect with the Community:
Join a community of fellow lords and ladies, share your experiences, and provide feedback as we collectively shape the evolution of the Medieval Machines Builder. Join other medieval fans on our discord: https://discord.com/invite/YBVMXVCEAN

This is a prologue of the Medieval Machines Builder game that is coming out soon. If you've liked the prologue you will love full version of the game. Add it to the wishlist to be the first to know all news, a release date, and discounts.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1584680/Medieval_Machines_Builder/

item.title: Metal Ascension
item.description:
About This Game



Metal Ascension is a reverse bullet hell, survival game with rogue-lite elements! Defeat the wave of enemies on each floor to level up, install and upgrade your mech and establish fire superiority.



In this fast-paced, top-down-shooter, use different combinations of weapons and pieces to destroy your enemies. Unlock up to 150 unique pieces to improve your mech. Can you reach the top floor and ascend as a legend?



Features
  • Chose between: auto-firing weapons or manual aiming option
  • Fast runs (under 30 minutes)
  • Unlock over 150+ pieces to customize and improve your mech
  • Survive waves lasting 20 to 60 seconds each and kill off as many enemy mechs as you can during that time
  • Collect materials and get items from the shop between waves of enemies
  • Gain experience destroying mechs to upgrade your stats

item.title: Unnatural: Benighted
item.description:
About This Game



This game is an independent work inspired by American urban legends and is not affiliated with any TV series, movies, or copyrighted fictional universes.

All characters, events and coincidences that may occur during the game are purely coincidental and have no relation to real people, places or events. Any coincidences with real situations, personalities or historical facts are purely coincidental. The content and plot of the game are fictional and created for entertainment purposes only. The developers are not responsible for possible misinterpretations or unintended consequences of game events.
Play at your own discretion and exercise good judgment in all things.

A gripping story of two hunters of unclean forces investigating the disappearance of people.



The main character, Sim, has a wife who goes missing. During the investigation, he learns that she is in the hands of a powerful demon who is blackmailing our protagonist in every way possible.
He enlists the help of his best friend Dan, who also has a personal grudge against the demon.

They will have to put a lot of effort to get out of this difficult situation.

When they start actively searching for the main suspect, the danger on their way grows to unbelievable proportions. The police and the hunters of unclean powers think that the same man is behind all these crimes...

Monsters

.Along the way, we will encounter all kinds and horrible monsters that we will have to fight.

Fear and Terror

.Evil awaits them in every home, every village, and every forest.

item.title: Slayin DX
item.description:
About This Game

The mobile hit Slayin returns with an all new look! Gather your twitch skills and control one of 6 heroes as they hold back wave after of wave of monstrous foes. Collect coins along the way and spend them wisely at passing merchants to give you the leg up in your never ending battle. Can you defeat the dragon and his minions?

Slayin DX includes:
  • The original Slayin.
  • Slayin DX mode. This is the same gameplay as the original game but with updated pixel art.
  • Remappable keyboard and gamepad support.
  • Leaderboard graveyard where you can customize your own tombstone and display it amongst your friends.
  • Unlockable characters, gameskins and more.

Slayin is a single screen action rpg. The rules are simple: hit enemies with your weapon, but don't let them hit your body. it sounds simple, but requires a bit of finesse and practice. The more enemies you slay, the better the treasure they drop. Treasure is valuable for upgrading your hero, but it also heals you in battle, so keeping a high combo in the later stages is the only way to survive.

item.title: VRosty
item.description:
About This Game

A Snowman's Journey Into The Anthropocene


One day VRosty, the little snowman, wakes up from a long dream, because it is too hot. He needs your help to find the reason for the warming. Guide him on his long journey through >30 stages and keep him cool!

A VR-puppet-puzzle-platformer


  • Puppet-on-a-string controls
  • VRosty hangs like a puppet under your hand
  • Move yourself with the joystick and hold A so that VRosty follows you
  • Jump by quickly moving the controller upwards
  • Throw snowballs with the Trigger button and aim by tilting your hand
  • Solve puzzles based on physics and the unique controls
  • Pull-along VRosty through >30 stages
  • Collect >100 snowflakes
  • Keep cool

item.title: Gratuitous Space Shooty Game
item.description:
About This Game

Gratuitous Shooty Game is a hobby space shooter made by the developer of Gratuitous Space Battles, reusing the art from that game :D.

This game is just a simple space shooty game where you use the left and right arrow keys to control your ship, and the spacebar to fire. Ever-more deadly waves of alien ships attack you in a suspiciously slow and predictable pattern, enabling your single spaceship to somehow overcome incredible odds and defeat all of them, given enough skill.

Watch out for bonuses that drop from alien ships, especially those cheeky ones that fly across the top of the screen.

At the end of each battle, your level score becomes a cash bonus, but you are penalized for every alien ship that flies off screen intact. Think of this as you paying reparations to the relatives of those whose houses are blown up by those pesky aliens who got away.

After each level you get to upgrade your ship using your bonus cash. Invest in better shields, better lasers, faster thrusters to move your ship, or a better rate of fire.

For budgetary reasons, your planet only has a budget for a limited number of ships, and for reasons that are unclear, only one can be launched at a time. If you run out of ships, you fail. Sadface.

Technical stuff: Windows only, because meh. Fixed resolution of 1920x1080

item.title: OnlySociety: Secret
item.description:
About This Game

The games are primarily action role-playing games. The player takes on the role of the protagonist, "Yue," defending the last stand of the town as part of quests given to them by locals during the death epoch involving recruiting members, growing, and gathering various resources to craft equipment.

History timeline:
Termination
The flu disease happened in 2019 is just only the tip of the iceberg due to overpopulated human. There come by the avalanche of human extinction where screams from the death realm can be heard in the midgard was known as "Virus X".

Extinction
The universe will always have in order. During the even of extinction, while God still had job for his children's, God responded by giving word of gospel which blessed the homosapiens with his energy to stay secure on our feet. "Keep your feet on the ground and keep reaching for the stars". Casey Kasem.

Death
God in having its battle in divine realm and death is walking upon the living reason over population in the Niflheim. During the era of extinction, God left homosapiens wisdom. There are more jobs to be done and it depends on how homosapiens manifest the remaining wisdom.

You don't only live once. You live every day and die only once.
However, you are given the chance to make a change.
So, use it wisely.

item.title: War Hospital
item.description: About This Game

item.title: Unstoppable
item.description:
About This Game

Unstoppable is an adrenaline-pumping horror adventure where you‚Äôre tasked with escaping Schindler Tower.

A mysterious gas has turned office workers insane ‚Ä¶ Now everyone is out for blood. Face dimly-lit corridors filled with death, search for clues to find a cure, and keep the psychotic horde at bay any way you can. Will you get to the bottom of the infection or die in the dark?



Realistic Combat
Challenging, physics-based combat. Feel the weight of each blow and dodge infected enemies.



Unpredictable Enemies
The infected do not all think alike ‚Äì watch out for new weapons and attack patterns.



Finite Resources
Your weapons are limited ‚Äì use them well. Balance item durability against increasingly difficult enemies.



Shadowed World
Play a game of cat and mouse in the shadows. Stay cautious ‚Äì the infected can hear your footsteps!



Episodic Story
What is this mysterious gas, and who unleashed it? Unravel the global conspiracy with each new chapter.



Berserk Mode
Strive to keep your humanity as the infection builds in your system. Stay sharp or join the infected.

item.title: Package Runner
item.description:
About This Game

In "Package Runner", you are the 22th package handler of ZENITH COMPANY. Your task is to fix packages and put them in order. When the "Central Control" demands, you must remember the location of each package and find it quickly. As time goes on, you'll detect the truth of the company.

\\ Work Hard \\\...


\\ Rest Time \\\...


\\ Features \\\...
- Stylized 2.5D graphics, relaxing gaming experience.
- Over 3000 items (up to 247 types to collect) in a huge workspace.
- In rest area, you can collect decorations, get stronger by feast.
- Easter eggs in the game will reveal the whole story behind gameplay.

item.title: Momodora: Moonlit Farewell
item.description:
About This Game

"Momodora: Moonlit Farewell" is the latest installment in the Momodora series. Join Momo, High Priestess of the village of Koho, as she embarks on a divine mission to save her people from imminent destruction at the hands of the demon hordes summoned by a malevolent bellringer.

Story:

Momodora: Moonlit Farewell presents the account of the greatest calamity to befall the village of Koho, five years after the events of Momodora III.
Once the toll of an ominous bell is heard, the village is soon threatened by a demon invasion.
The village's matriarch sends Momo Reinol, their most capable priestess, to investigate the bell and find the bellringer responsible for summoning demons. It is their hope that by finding the culprit, they will also be able to secure the village's safety, and most importantly, the sacred Lun Tree's, a source of life and healing for Koho...

Features:

  • Gorgeous pixel art and animation
  • Action-packed gameplay focusing on melee combos, dodging enemy attacks, and firing arrows at enemies
  • The "Sigil" system, which allows for greatly customizable play styles
  • Intense and core-shaking boss battles
  • Deep exploration into a world rich in lore and atmosphere
  • Freely adjustable difficulty levels, allowing you to relax and explore the alluring world at your own pace or take on mighty foes for a real challenge

Developer's Voice:

Hello!

This is rdein, creator of the Momodora series. Recently my team and I have announced the latest installment in the series, ‚ÄúMoonlit Farewell‚Äù. This is a concluding story, following through from the events of Momodora 3. With this new tale, I also intend to close the book on many of the past games‚Äô mysteries and questions.

I‚Äôm aware that many players are more familiar with the story of Kaho, which is set in a distant past. As such, I‚Äôm designing ‚ÄúMoonlit Farewell‚Äù to be as enjoyable as possible without prior knowledge of Momodora 1 to 3‚Äôs stories. Moreover, the series has always been focused on action and minimal stories. So please, don‚Äôt worry too much about ‚Äúcatching up‚Äù!
Lastly, we hope to bring you our best game with this new title, using all the knowledge we‚Äôve learned in the past 10 years. Please look forward to it!

item.title: Maneuver
item.description:
About This Game

Maneuver is a fast-paced, melee-focused, first-person perspective (FPP) action game featuring captivating synthwave art styles and innovative gameplay that allows players to heist opponent's body through hacking.

Embark on a Journey

Take on the role of the first mercenary, known as 'Knight,' on a quest for revenge against the 'Syndicate' that sealed your freedom. Unleash chaos in this unstable cyber realm and liberate yourself from those seeking to imprison you.

Hacking Mechanics

Use your shuriken to hack targets. Heist bodies, transform objects, and gain an advantage that can assist you in battle. Hack in-game objects strategically to turn the tide in your favor.

First-Person Combat Experience

Engage in swift combat through dashing and hacking, immersing yourself in gameplay from a first-person perspective. Navigate the cyber realm with dynamic and immersive gameplay.

Hit Satisfaction in Synthwave Art Style

In the synthwave art style, wield your weapon and experience the sense of impact, observing enemy debris scattering across the cybernetic landscape.

item.title: Necro Rumble
item.description:
About This Game

Resurrect the corpses to build your army, defeat the mortals, and survive to the end!


Lead the army of the undead.

  • In our game, the Necromancer doesn't engage in direct combat.
Instead, utilize undead units to fend off enemies approaching from all directions.




  • For the Necromancer, the corpses of enemies are potential troops.
Revive these bodies at critical moments to turn the tide of battle in your favor.




  • Special enemies will appear to challenge you.
However, once defeated and turned into corpses, they too can be resurrected as part of your undead legion.

Do whatever it takes to survive until the last.


Choose your rewards wisely to evolve into the ultimate Necromancer!

  • Every Necromancer has a unique approach to combat.
As you create and sacrifice undead, you'll be presented with choices to strengthen your undead forces.

  • Through these enhancements, decide which type of undead in your legion will become more powerful and how to boost their abilities.

  • Consider the synergies between different undead types to build a formidable army and engage in battle.

item.title: Frostrain
item.description:
About This Game

Roam the frozen world


Climate change has turned the world white and frozen, and the only thing moving on the planet is you, your passengers, and your train. It's a dead world, but ironically, it's all the more fascinating for it. A vivid landscape awaits you to explore.

Keep your passengers happy


The passengers on your train will work diligently at your command, but be careful: if you don't manage their happiness properly, they might throw you off the train.

Build your own train with card decks


Each time you pass through a city, you'll be able to add new train cars by launching a heavy lift drone. Be careful with each choice you make. If you are lucky, you'll be able to build a better, more synergized, happily-ever-after train deck, but it won't always go as you planned.

Reach the Promised Land


Lead your passengers in search of the Promised Land, somewhere on the eastern edge of the world. But the journey to the Promised Land isn't all smooth and pleasant. You'll have to pass through toxic areas, and a severe storm is brewing behind you. Pay attention to your passengers' happiness levels and lead them safely to the Promised Land. The journey is in your hands.

item.title: Gravitia
item.description:
About This Game

Gravitia is a unique adventure game that utilizes gravity to escape a mysterious world.




The gun creates a gravity field centered on the point of impact, which attracts the environment and objects except for gravity bullets.
This allows you to move objects that are out of reach or move walls that are in your way to move forward.
Try this unique interaction that defies the laws of nature for a different experience.




It is unclear where this mysterious place is located and how it came to be.
Explore the unknown and approach the secrets of the space as they unfold in the fog. As the fog slowly clears, you will gradually reach the secrets of the space.

item.title: Underminer
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome. New miner!

Interesting underground world!

Different minerals and formations, underground caves and treasure maps.
There's a lot of interesting stuff under the ground!

Get stronger to explore!

Get closer to the 'King of Miner' rank.
The more powerful drill machines you upgrade to, the deeper underground you can explore!

Legendary Minerals in the Veil!

Find clues to the legendary minerals hidden in ancient air defenses.
Help the people of the underworld and you'll be one step closer to the secret.

Adventure awaits!

item.title: BoardLand
item.description:
About This Game

Create your own strategy with the dice



The dice is rolled!
Are you going to move? Are you going to act?
Different effects are applied to each die, and the numbers determine your behavior.
How do you combine numbers to get the best results?
Every time you pick a number, you'll have to choose carefully.

Make a powerful board by strengthening the tiles.



Tiles get more and more powerful!
Every time you act on a tile, the tile gains experience, and the tile with enough experience is upgradeable.
Combine tiles with multiple properties to create the best strategy, your own board

Defeat the monsters and bosses



Monsters disturb you!
Monsters can summon Fireballs, or they can curse and cause obstacles to certain tiles.
You have to move and act with the dice, avoiding these patterns every time.

item.title: The Sand Knight
item.description:
About This Game

Rampage through your enemies in this twin-stick kiter fighter.

Kill your foes and power up your mech in this combat-heavy game of destruction and mayhem. Maneuver around the battlefield, avoiding enemy fire while dishing it out in kind. This game is all about tanky bullet-hell combat while exploring a power fantasy through various upgrade paths.

The Battle for Sansil Prime
As you battle through the game, you will defeat enemy soldiers, mechanical armors, and mechs in a progressive twin-stick bullet hell. Experience combat as a tanky mech, choosing from a variety of weapons including the Machine Gun, Flamethrower, Rocketlauncher, and a Sword! Throughout each level you will encounter story elements and boss battles as you collect resources to increase your mech's capabilities. Between each level you apply your upgrades and continue on in a highly replayable experience. Should your mech fall in combat, you have one final chance to redeem yourself on the battlefield as an evasive pilot in a classic 1-hit death bullet hell experience.

This game provides the player with opportunities to engage in tactical combat maneuvers against various AIs, strategic upgrade choices, and multiple forms mid-combat resource management. Optional challenges ramp up the difficulty of gameplay while rewarding you with the resources to empower your mech. Can you master the gameplay to defeat the Militia's armies?

This game features two modes:

Legend of the Sand Knight: A story-driven linear experience meant to ease the player into the game's mechanics and allow for an exciting hand-crafted adventure.
The Sand Knight Chronicles: Continue to battle in the war-torn world of Sansil Prime in a procedurally generated rogue-like where you can put your mettle to the test in an ever-increasing challenge mode.

Story Summary:
On the colony world of Sansil Prime, two militaristic groups vie for control of the planet after the homeworld comms went dark. The world is on a collision course with catastrophe, with a large population of colonists stuck in the middle of the conflict. Presented with an impossible choice, Sammi and her colleague, known only as "The Mercenary," set off on a mission to stop these tyrannical factions and free their countrymen from the oppression of evil men.

item.title: Basketball Grand Slam 2024
item.description:
About This Game

A competitive game with real-time operation. There is no complicated player training. It depends entirely on operation to crush the opponent, taking you into the era of everyone's slam dunk.

[Real-time competition, multiple ways to play]


The game uses real-time synchronization technology to ensure fair competition among players. Smooth operation and silky feel. Invite friends to team up and open a room, or play single-player games anytime and anywhere to show off your skills. There are various modes such as 3v3 ranked matches, Bullfighting Grand Prix, casual shooting matches, etc. It‚Äôs up to you how you want to win in the new season!

[Royal Stadium, legendary stars]


Seaside parks, bar streets, city flyovers, and multiple real stadiums can be switched at will! Many legendary superstars have gathered together to form various super lineups. With a variety of playing styles and tactical coordination, the fun is all under your control. It‚Äôs up to you to control whether it‚Äôs a lone hero that shocks the audience, or a gorgeous collaboration.

[Personalized fashion, thousands of combinations]


Hundreds of fashions to wear at your leisure! Hairstyle, clothes, pants, shoes, backpack, glasses and suits, from head to toe, everything is meticulous. You will be the center of attention in the entire competition! Each type of clothing will increase the attributes of a fixed value, and specific players will also have exclusive clothing. Wear the most fashionable clothes and defeat your opponents.

[Fancy skills, shining in the audience]


25 fancy skills such as backhand windmill, free throw line dunk, fadeaway jump shot, fancy dribbling, and back dribble, 17 training attributes, and various celebrations after scoring a goal, allowing you to ignite the audience. !

item.title: KARNAL
item.description:
About This Game


KARNAL is a short atmospheric experience inspired by classic shooters from the 90's, with a modern twist.

You assume the role of an anonymous journalist, who finds himself in a scenario blurring the lines between nightmare and reality.

  • GROWING ARSENAL - Your array of weapons gets bigger as your enemies increase in numbers and strength.
  • UNFORGIVING ENEMY COUNTS - You must take advantage of your weapons, environments, and movement speed to defeat your enemies.
  • ATMOSPHERE - The levels are composed of dark, moody environments that will each transform into blood-stained arenas as you progress.
  • ARENA MODE - Save up money to purchase weapons and supplies, then battle endless waves of enemies in your arena of choice.

item.title: Furballer
item.description:
About This Game

Be welcome to the puppet show ! Today, The Furballer will amuse you with a unique performance: football puppet destruction.




Furballer is an arcade game where you take on the role of a puppet football player: The Furballer. Navigate the stage, kicking the ball into the enemy puppets to rack up points and secure the best show. The public will rate your performance live so be sharp, don't miss and keep on kicking ass... or heads !

item.title: Progeria: Vae Victis
item.description:
About This Game

XXI century.

The Russian Empire.

Saint Petersburg Academic University of Necromagic. In the society of prevailed neofeudalism necromages hold power. Kirill Eletsky is a noble young man and a fifth-year student at the academy of sorcery. He wishes to protect his family from accusations of treason before the tsar, and he must become a winner in the most prestigous necromagic tournament in the empire. Only your decisions will decide which way he fulfills his wish.

Features

  • Immerse yourself in a world where magic lives in symbiosis with technology!
  • Develop relationships with other characters, each of them can influence the outcome of the tournament!
  • Socialize, spend time, and send gifts to other noblemen to earn their loyalty!
  • Choose carefully your partners to help you win battles!
  • Prepare yourself wisely for battle by picking the most suitable armour, weapons, and spells!
  • Be smart about how you allocate your resources - your spare time is limited and your enemy is always stronger and richer than you!
  • Train Kirill to become the best necromage of modern age!
  • Gather an army of the like-minded necromages among students and make the Tsar play by your rules.

Gameplay

  • Play through a 30-day story and get one of the several endings.
  • Duel with rivals through a match-three mini-game, where you determine your weapon, armor, type of spells and a partner.
  • Work as an exorcist to fund your endeavours.
  • Create bonds between you and your allies.
  • Take part in battles of nobles against serfs.

Progeria: Vae Victis is based on the lore of the book Viva la Post Mortem by Russian fantasy writer Igor Olegovich Davydov in co-authorship with him.

item.title: Cyber Sprint
item.description:
About This Game

Wallrun, slide, bunnyhop, and strafe your way to the end of the level, replaying and shaving off precious seconds to get the fastest possible time.



At its core, Cyber Sprint is all about speedrunning mastery. Players must become adept at navigating the digital landscapes with unparalleled agility, employing a combination of sprinting, sliding, jumping, and wall-running to maintain momentum and shave off precious seconds. Each level presents a unique set of challenges and puzzles that demand split-second decision-making and quick reflexes to outwit the game's obstacles and achieve the fastest possible times.



Immerse yourself in a high-octane gameplay experience, meticulously crafted to revolve entirely around a lightning-fast pace game and level design. Push your limits as you challenge yourself by making split-second decisions and overcoming the numerous obstacles that will do anything they can to slow you down.




Time is your relentless adversary. Each level presents a ticking clock, compelling you to finish it as swiftly as possible. With competitions planned in the future, learning how to beat the levels and the entirety of the game is a huge part of the Cyber Sprint game loop.
